review_text: Bought this for my Mother who had her version from about 8-9 years ago finally die out. It looks almost identical (other than some minor cosmetical changes over the years) to her previous version.Judging from her original version, if it lasts at last as that, she'll be thrilled. Great little food processor.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
